name: Death Desert
overview: A shooter created by Christian Wurzer and released in Compute mit 1986/08. Teriax, a poor planet that is one-third desert, is getting noisy the judgment of the Galactic Security Council for at least two years has been that this will be a future colony. Currently, you eke out an existence during the day at an outdated plasma cannon, while at night you are regularly roused from your sleep by squadrons of bombers flying by. Before sunset, an attack by the dreaded All-Pirates is concentrating on your space base of all places. Alongside jet-black fighters who only aim for a collision, pterosaurs drop acid bombs. Only a precise shot in the eye of these monsters can incapacitate them, which, however, causes the opponent's mothership to immediately counter with deadly energy pulses which must be avoided.
